definition: face/side/surface/aspect/top/classifier for flat surfaces such as drums, mirrors, flags etc

sentences.english: Door hinged on the left hand side, one-hand operation, lockable.
sentences.chinese: 門絞鏈在左面，單手操作，有門鎖。

sentences.english: Saying, resemble old gentleman moving left of figure of Buddha again.
sentences.chinese: 說著，又將老君像搬到佛像左面去。

sentences.english: At the left of the opening was a dark and deep angle.
sentences.chinese: 在洞口的左面，有一個又黑又深的角落。

sentences.english: To the left of the thrones, near the window.
sentences.chinese: 在王座的左面，靠近窗戶。

sentences.english: It must not look to the left or right but go forward.
sentences.chinese: 不能指望它盯着左面或着右面，還能往前走。

sentences.english: Lava is spilled to right and left, destroying forests and cities.
sentences.chinese: 岩漿往右面和左面噴灑，毀滅了森林和都會。

sentences.english: On our left were the shops, their windows lighted, and the entrance to the galleria .
sentences.chinese: 我們的左面是店窗明亮的鋪子和商業街廊的入口。

sentences.english: On his left is the Buddha of Medicine.
We sit for too long at the computer, sapping energy.
sentences.chinese: 左面在電腦前坐太久，精力在消耗。

sentences.english: He played the ball to the fielder's left,and took a guick run.
sentences.chinese: 他把球擊向守場員的左面，然後便快跑。
左面，距離27海哩，敵機高度7000尺。

sentences.english: No , that ' s to the left , three windows down the hall.
sentences.chinese: 不，領匯款單的地方在左面，沿大廳過去三個窗口。

sentences.english: So, that's the left hand side.
To her left was a concrete blockhouse.
sentences.chinese: 她的左面有一個鋼筋水泥的碉堡。

definition: left/the left side/to the left of
middle/center/right in the middle or center/nub
right in the midpoint/a bull's eye/to hit the nail on the head
east/east side/eastern part/to the east of
